inclusion.criterion: histological or neuroradiographic documented recurrent glioma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: anaplastic astrocytoma, mixed malignant glioma or oligodendroglioma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Karnofsky performance score (KPS) of > or equal to 50
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: predicted life expectancy of at least 12 weeks
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Pregnancy test for females with child-bearing potential negative
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must sign and date an IRB approved informed consent form
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: irritable bowel disease, irritable bowel syndrome, chronic diarrhea or presence of a bowel obstruction
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: second active malignancy or diagnosis of other cancer within 3 years of enrollment
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma and has undergone radiation and chemotherapy. He is currently experiencing progressive lower extremity weakness and urinary retention.
